original_title: President to meet Tamil MPs on Monday (15)
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Another discussion will be held on Monday (15) between President Ranil Wickremesinghe and the Tamil MPs representing the North-Eastern Provinces.
Tamil National Alliance Spokesperson MP MA Sumanthiran PC said the discussion will be held at the President's Office at 5.30pm on Monday (15).
Issues such as devolution of power, land issues in the North and the release of Tamil prisoners will be discussed during the meeting.
Five rounds of talks have been held between Tamil MPs and the President since December 2022.
Minister of Justice Dr. Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe PC said the President is also preparing to hold discussions with Muslim MPs in future regarding issues faced by the community they represent.
